name: panicking::panic_nounwind_fmt

fmt::Arguments: Unknown([Field(0, Ty { id: 83, kind: RigidTy(Adt(AdtDef(DefId { id: 24479, name: "fmt::Arguments" }), GenericArgs([Lifetime(Region { kind: ReErased })]))) })])

doc:
Like `panic_fmt`, but for non-unwinding panics.

 Has to be a separate function so that it can carry the `rustc_nounwind` attribute.
